ComicInfo.Summary: A deadly feud has erupted between Grifter's stepbrother and stepsister, with each party vying for control of their imprisoned father's empire. Remaining neutral is not an option for Cole when he finds out that his brother, Max, has entered the fray...and things only go from bad to worse when the mysterious Joe the Dead returns, looking to whack Grifter for defaming his "good" name!
